body.name: Asiahorse Matrix-Black 56 Addressable RGB LEDs 360MM All-in-One Square Frame Integrated Fan with MB Sync/Analog Controller, PWM Control Fan for Computer Case and Liquid Cooling System
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 4 hrs 25 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 4 hrs 25 mins
features: 【Simplified Installation】AsiaHorse 3 * 120mm rgb fans feature an integrated design, making installation a breeze and reducing issues with cable management. Experience excellent heat dissipation for your case while adding a touch of fun and enhancing your gaming experience.

【Vibrant RGB Lighting】Asiahorse computer case fans boast 56 independently-controlled addressable RGB LEDs, allowing for full color customization. The RGB lighting can sync with your motherboard, providing compatibility with most Addressable RGB capable motherboards, including Aura Mystic Light and Polychome Sync.

【Precise PWM Control】Utilizing PWM technology, our pc rgb fans can be run at the precise speed necessary for highly efficient ventilation. This guarantees peak performance when needed and ensures a longer lifespan for your cooling solution.

【Quiet Operation】Equipped with three 120mm RGB PWM fans, our product delivers both vibrant color and improved airflow for exceptional pc cooling performance. With dynamic speed adjustments ranging from 800 RPM to 1800 RPM, you have the ability to minimize noise or maximize airflow. Maximum Air Flow: 66.5CFM; Noise Level: 16～34.3dB(A)
【Versatile Compatibility】Not only compatible with most chassis, but also works seamlessly with CPU Liquid Coolers, providing robust thermal protection for your chassis and CPU.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The AsiaHorse Matrix 360mm Case Fans is a newest computer case fan with a combination of three 120m computer fans, which is designed to a single square frame for quick and easy installation. No more cumbersome computer cable management! Perfect choice for all users who are looking for quick and painless install and focused build aesthetics

This rgb fans is designed with 5V 3pin ARGB Port and PWM interface, working with most motherboards that have an addressable RGB header, you can feel the flow with full colour fun, and perfect match your PC's theme. Compatible with Asus Aura, ASRock RGB and MSI RGB. Featuring complete PWM control, dynamically control fan speed from 800 RPM to 1,800 RPM for precise noise and airflow adjustment. Specification: Power Interface: 2510-4P+AURA3pin Power:3.6W Fan Speed Control: 800-1800±10% Air Volume: 57CFM±10% Noise: 24dBA
Besides, this pc case fans provides a specific air cooling solution. Can be used for case and liquid coolers.

High Airflow Design High-speed rotation, bringing you stable wind pressure output LINKAGE MOTOR Multiple new design motors in series, more stable and long life. INTEGRATED DESIGN 4pcs anti-vibration gaskets to reduce the noise caused by resonance. Enhance installation stability.

56 LAMP BEADS Bring your computer to life by having the fan display a rainbow of colors. Two Control Methods With 5v 3-pin and 4-pin connectors, equipped with a hub. Easily control and change the colors by connecting to M/B or ARGB controller Quiet and Cooling Built-in PWM highly integrated chip, actively eliminates motor electromagnetic noise

MATRIX 360MM FS9002 PRO WD 001 Eclipse Case Fan M-Truck S001 Fan Size 240/360*120*25mm 120*120*25mm 120*120*25mm 120*120*25mm 140*140*25mm 120*120*25mm Package 1 Pcs 3 Pcs/5 Pcs/6 Pcs/9 Pcs 3 Pcs/5 Pcs 5 Pcs/6 Pcs 2 Pcs/3 Pcs 3 Pcs/5 Pcs Lamp Beads/RGB Outside 32+Inside 24 lights/ARGB Outside 20+Inside 6 lights/ARGB Inside 12 lights/ARGB Outside 16+ Inside 8 Lights/ARGB Inside 18 lights/ARGB Outside 8+Inside 20 lights/ARGB Fan Speed 800-1800±10％ 800-1800±10％ 800-1800±10％ 1500±10％ 800-1500±10％ 800-1800±10％ Airflow(CFM) 57±10％ CFM Max/pcs 57±10％ CFM Max 57.8±10％ CFM Max 37±10％ CFM Max 44±10％ CFM Max 57±10％ CFM Max PWM Funcation ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Static Pressure 1.2mm/H2O 1.2mm/H2O 1.2mm/H2O 1.02mm/H2O 1.4mm/H2O 1.98mm/H2O Noise Level (dBA) 24dBA Max 24dBA Max 22.8 ±10% dBA Max 20.1dBA Max 26.2dBA Max 30dBA Max Motherboard Header 5V 3Pin+PWM 4Pin 5V 3Pin+PWM 4Pin 5V 3Pin+PWM 4Pin 5V 3Pin+PWM 4Pin 5V 3Pin+PWM 4Pin 5V 3Pin+PWM 4Pin Control method Controller/Motherboard Controller/Motherboard Controller/Motherboard Controller/Motherboard Motherboard Controller/Motherboard

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great aRGB fan unit
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for some RGB fans to add to the top of my gaming desktop and stumbled on this fan combo unit. Installation was a breeze! Just plug the fan cable and 5v 3pin cable into the motherboard, screw in the fan, tuck the cables and you're set! Honestly, tucking cables took the most time.The RGB control works great with my MSI motherboard with Mystic Light controls.Other than the fan cable plug feeling loose and the 5v 3pin cable not fitting as snug as I would like I don't have any complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 2/3 faulty pls read all
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I buy 3 set of this rgb fan, 2 out of 3 is faulty.. 1 out of 3 fans are doesnt function ... it just spin a little but doeant spin all the way and continuesly as shown in the video.But as rgb they function well and good looking...I also buy the hub for this which the 3 pin for led doesnt work.. so i just use a spliter to directly connected them to mobo. But the fan side of the hub works. And only this 3 is connected to that hub. 3 set of e fans = 9 fans.*** hub is not included on this set of fans.. i buy it separately... ill make another review on that, but not until i get the 4 pins spliter i ordered to take that off and return.. i buy that 98% for my led/rgb 3 pins of my fans but turns out faulty as well.... using 2 of 4 spliter of 3 pins at the moment for my fan led/rgb.Dont get me wrong, i may only get badluck to receive faulty matrix, but the looks and fan is great, im actually using 1 that in perfect condition on my water block as pull fan.. it helps ... i did a sandwich setup, 3 oem corsair fan on top of the water block, and the matrix on the bottom.. it look awesome and perform great, ill be changing my rate,review supposed to be on the item performance, i based my review on the faulty item... so im changing it base on the perfect condition item.. we just get unlucky sometimes. Its easy to request return or replacement anyways, minus to those who leave far on the available/approve return center.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the look. Only reason for 4 stars is because the rgb is only "diffusable" if you're not trying to program it. Otherwise, each fan is the same color as the rails.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awful Noise When Fans Go To Work - UPDATED
reviews.reviewText: One of the 3 fans clicks like something is in the fan whenever there is a system load and the fan spins up. I was lazy and should have returned this but now the window to return is closed. I'd stay away from this, I'm going to go with a well known brand.***UPDATE 9/15/23***The manufacturer reached out to me and send me a replacement unit. It works great. No noise, everything works as it should and it does a great job exhausting the heat. The lights look great, no complaints. Changed my review to 5 stars due to the excellent customer service and care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy To Install - Fascinating Color Show
reviews.reviewText: Couldn't be easier for my aged fingers to install. Minimum of wires to connect. I put two 360s in my new Neo Qube 2 case and the different lighting options offer plenty from which to choose. Six fans plus the radiator fan do not make a quiet PC, but my CPU temps are around 30C and the light show is amazing. Beauty is important in life. I'm retired and not usually involved in anything at my PC I wouldn't mind a little distraction from anyway. If you don't mind a little fan noise, depending on your case, and you want a captivating light show, try these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had it for about a month now and it works well and keeps everything cool and quiet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These fans look great, do exactly what I want and are super quiet! I replaced a couple of gaming fans that were fairly quiet. But my rig is right next to my desk at ear height. Old fans let you know the computer was running. After installing these fans, I had to visually check to make sure they were working as I did not hear the fans. Very pleased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful fans, worrying problems
reviews.reviewText: I got these fans on April 22nd 2021. to put in my new computer case and they look incredible. I also greatly appreciate that Asiahorse has done away with the need for a separate controller and the fans/LEDs can plug directly into a 5V ARGB header on your motherboard and the fans themselves are on separate 4pin PWM.That being said, they do include a SATA powered ARGB controller in the box but I recommend STRONGLY that you DO NOT USE this. Out of curiosity, I hooked mine up to the controller to see what settings it might have. When I hooked it up NOTHING happened. The lights didn't turn on. I went to check the connection and the cables themself to make sure I plugged everything in correctly and the control box and wires had heated up so much that it was uncomfortable to handle the wires anymore.Plugging the ARGB cable directly into my motherboard seemed to work perfectly fine.Everything worked flawlessly for the first couple days that I've had these hooked up. However on the day of writing this review (April 25th) the LEDs lit up for about a second before cutting out and wouldn't turn back on for a couple hours before randomly turning back on. Considering I've only been using these for 3 days now is very worrying, especially the fact that had I not checked on the wiring for the included control box, I probably would have set my computer on fire.Edit:Changing to a 1 star review because of the potential fire hazard. In addition to that, the LEDs on the fan just work at random.
Funciona muy bien y con las luces encendidas casi ni se ve que es rosa

Got this A) Because I couldn't find matching fansB) In case of a future upgrade to 360 aioLooks great, fans are relatively quiet and syncs well with other RGB in the system. Just plugged it into the controller and worked fine.

El producto es muy bueno, tiene gran iluminacion, y en una computadora con rgb luce fenomenal, sin embargo no le doy cinco estrellas, por el hecho que la unica forma de modificar los colores y el rgb es por un control concetado a la pieza. porloque al ponerlo en otra parte del case, hay que estra abriendola para poder encontrar el deseado.

reviews.reviewTitle: Der schönste Lüfter den ich je hatte, aber...
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Der Asiahorse Lüfter mit 360mm Durchmesser, wurde bei mir aus den USA geliefert. Das bedingt eine recht lange Wartezeit für Amazon Verhältnisse jedenfalls. Der Einbau war sehr simpel, es ist alles dabei was man brauchen könnte. Die Optik (in meinen Bilder leider durch den Mesh Rahmen beeinträchtigt) ist absolut super. Ich habe euch extra einmal ein Bild mit und Eines ohne Blitz gemacht. Zusätzlich noch ein kurzes Video vom Farbverlauf.Der Anschluss lief ohne Probleme, man kann entweder per SATA anschließen, per PWM Anschluss oder per ungeregeltem Lüfter Anschluss. Adapter sind ausreichend vorhanden.Einen Punkt Abzug gibt es beim Preis-/-Leistungsverhältnis weil die PWM Funktion bei mir nicht funktionieren möchte. Ich habe jetzt allerdings keinen Bedarf ihn wieder zurückzuschicken, dazu gefällt er mir zu gut. Das äußert sich bei mir darin das der Rechner beim hochfahren mault der Lüfter hätte einen Defekt und dann ganz normal funktioniert. Ich kühle damit einen i9 10850K an einer NZXT Kraken X73 AIO. Der Prozessor erreicht, mit der Standard Lüfterdrehzahl, weder unter Prime 95 oder unter Cinebench Temperaturen von mehr als 68 Grad was ich vollkommen OK finde, dafür das die Lüfter nichtmehr schneller können.Das Laufgeräusch das ihr vielleicht auf dem Video hören könnt, je nachdem wie laut ihr den PC stellt, stammt NICHT vom Asiahorse sondern den oberen 3 Gehäuselüftern, die übrigens die original NZXT Lüfter sind. Werden noch ausgetauscht. Der Asiahorse ist komplett ruhig und so gut wie garnicht zu hören.Auch wenn die Regelung nicht ganz funktioniert, so sieht dieser All-In-One Lüfter doch Mega schick aus. Ich hätte mir gewünscht das er vielleicht einen Zentimeter schmaler gewesen wäre, damit er nicht hinter die Befestigung muss, sondern vorne, direkt vor die Glasfront gepasst hätte. So muss ich Radiator und Lüfter zusammen innenliegend verbauen, was ordentlich Platz wegnimmt und störend wirkt, vor allem weil ich den Radiator SO nicht einbauen wollte, aber mit einem größeren Gehäuse klappt das wohl auch besser... oder einem schmaleren Radiator.Kurzfassung:Optik TOPAnschluss leichtLieferumfang großPreis vollkommen angemessenRGB Modi superController mitgeliefert!ABER:PWN Steuerung funktioniert nichtLüfter etwas zu dickkönnte eng werden bei kleinen GehäusenMein Urteil: Würde ich sofort wieder kaufen wenn ich einen bräuchte!
